title: Skew-product systems over infinite interval exchange transformations
abstract:
We study the ergodic properties (recurrence, discrepancy, diffusion
coefficients and ergodicity itself) of a class of $\mathbb Z$-extensions over
infinite interval exchange transformations called rotated odometers. The choice
of a skew-function is motivated by the use in the study of parallel flows on a
particular staircase manifold of infinite genus.
